channel.title: Dota 2 Ccg on LY - A Hobbyist | Medical Student
channel.description: Recent content in Dota 2 Ccg on LY - A Hobbyist | Medical Student

item.title: WIP3: All heroes added and new card design!
item.description: I’ve finally graduated from university! Time to use my spare time developing this game. Onwards to the new update, i’ve finally added all the heroes from DOTA 2 with all the required stats. It’s now in a playable state but it still require some serious work on the stats. Beside that, i’ve made a new design to the card and created a website specifically for “DOTA2-CCG”, which can also be accessed from the sidebar menu.

item.title: WIP2: Slow development progress
item.description: This update is just to update you guys that i am still working on the game but lately the progress has been really slow as i have exam starting 1st May.

item.title: WIP1: Dota 2 Collectible Card Game
item.description: A simple free CCG using Unreal Engine that has the same ruleset as Hearthstone so that the game will be easy for newbies to pickup.
